enhanced_by.reason: The 'basic' method uses 'addTags' to define allowed tags, which can be reused in test setup.
The 'basic' method uses 'addAttributes' to define allowed attributes, which can be reused in test setup.
The 'basic' method uses 'addProtocols' to define allowed protocols, which can be reused in test setup.
After setting up the safelist with 'basic', 'isSafeTag' can be used to verify the safelist configuration.
After setting up the safelist with 'basic', 'isSafeAttribute' can be used to verify the safelist configuration.
